definitions.definition: A country in West Asia in the Middle East . Official name: Syrian Arab Republic . Capital: Damascus .
Syria (an ancient region in the Levant in Western Asia , roughly coextensive with the modern country of Syria ).
An ancient Roman province between 64 BCE and 135 CE.

main_definition: A country in West Asia in the Middle East . Official name: Syrian Arab Republic . Capital: Damascus .
